Blog.post: Thats Right Summer for all of Gretna students started at 1:30 yesterday ROCK ON!This Morning Rocked Cuz 1)Prayer Group was a our later because people are out of school 2)We went to Panera Bread for it 3)We went to Super Target right after Prayer Group 4)I sat in the Church Parking lot for a half and hour just messing around with friends 5)AJ,Sarah,Joni,went to Joni's house after to Chill and watch a movie

Don't Step on the Ducks
Three guys die together in an accident and go to heaven. When they get there, St. Peter says, "We only have one rule here in heaven: Don't step on the ducks!"
So they enter heaven, and sure enough, there are ducks all over the place. It is almost impossible not to step on a duck, and although they try their best to avoid them, the first guy accidentally steps on one.
Along comes St. Peter with the ugliest woman he has ever seen. St. Peter chains them together and says, "Your punishment for stepping on a duck is to spend eternity chained to the ugly woman!"
The next day, the second guy steps accidentally on a duck, and along comes St. Peter, who doesn't miss a thing, and with him is another extemely ugly woman. He chains them together with the same admonishment as for the first guy.
The thrid guy has observed all this and not wanting to be chained for all eternity to an ugly woman, is very, VERY careful where he steps. He manages to go months without stepping on any ducks, but one day St. Peter comes up to him with the most gorgeous woman he has ever laid eyes on: a very tall, tan, curvaceous, sexy blonde. St. Peter chains them together without saying a word.
The guy remarks, "I wonder what I did to deserve being chained to you for all of eternity?"
She says, "I don't know about you, but I stepped on a duck!"

Ok Today was Graduation day So I went to that...best part was when I went through the bleechers for a friends bottle cap.then after I went to Sarah[AJ's G/F]'s Party stayed for a bit ate,Next Chris Hunters yeah a bit o fun then Kim's YEAH,after Kim's we went Heather's,then Vince's WOOT after Vince's we went back to Sarah's and stayed for a bit.Then we went back to Heathers house only we went to hang out with her little bro Mike[Fish],After Mike We came home...Fun day

Well tonight I chilled with Joni,Chelsea,Jessie,AJ and two others it was awsome.then came home ....yeah wish I was still out and I have Ethan and his 3 little friends in the basement making loads of noise I am one step from walking into the garage grabbing my wooden bat coming back down stairs and just completely Destroy them...GOODTIMES

Today I lugged out THE BEAST yeah thats right the huge Sega Genesis and I noticed how much fun it is to play a 16 bit game althought the disk mode is better so I have The Terminator and as the case said it's just like the movie only completely different I have the movie and I don't ever remember a blue haired guy who throws grenades or freaky red headed chicks with dual 45's oh well I had fun blasting them anyway

Nothing can bring me down today Thats right.1)yesterday I was told that I am finished with my videos and that all I have to do next week is like a few tests 2)I identified the John Doe band that sings the song I like The Band is:Cursive,the song The Recluse. THATS RIGHT NOTHING CAN BRING ME DOWN TODAY WOOT!

I like to ramble on about stuff like how cool my new blog looks AWSOME! the down side is I lost all of my links...SHOOT.well anyway Just beat another level of Outbreak on hard..Yeah when it says hard it is DEFINANTLY HARD but there is like nothing Ethan or I can't do on a video game.Church was cool last night the Seniour High played soccer and I rolled one of the youth leaders ankles and took the other one down like 4 times..I WAS GOING RED CARD CRAZY WOOT.

My like first post since the change because that other thingy was sorta telling what happened.Notice you can comment now yes thats right you couldn't before so please do comment if you want to. My friend Kaite came over Tuesday it was awsome I had a blast and I am hoping she did also although she completely destroyed me chess but HA YOU LOST IN THE WHOLE CHEETO WON'T TURN TONGUE GREEN FIGHT.So yeah good times.

Ok today I was like I need to delete some stuff from my blog so I shaved a little posting from the left then the right and said the heck with it and deleted every post.So Enjoy my New and Improved blog as it grows and hopefully and will be way better than before

Saturday Josh his family and I went to fun plex which was awsome till it rained and we all had to leave so we went to the movies.I remembered that the sequel to Pitch Black was out so I was like Josh we're seeing Riddick so we did and it was really violent and really cool .Then Sunday was the usual get up go to church come home,but AJ Josh and I wanted to see Riddick since AJ hadn't seen it yet.So we phoned Joni and we all went and messed around and went to Riddick,After that we came home and just messed around then went to the park at like 10:30 pm and Instantly "THEY"Came and made loads of noise so we left and Joni went home so Josh AJ Ethan Josh's brother Zack and I sat on the curb and ate chips and just sorta talked,A cop came by and went to the park flashing his light around and came back up the street and talked to us and mentioned how there was a disturbance in the park and stuff,so we talked to him and then Josh went home because it was late and we went inside.I HAVE SEEN RIDDICK TWICE NOW WOOT!

Lets see last night was a cool night,AJ,Joni,Steve and I went to Taco Bell for dinner which was pretty cool cept for when I almost died with a piece of hardshell in my throat I really need to learn to take littler bites,then off to Blockbuster to rent some movies since no really good ones were in theatres,Then off to steves where we played pool and watched him fail and fail and fail and oh wait fail at his stupid Need for speed underground game,So when it hit about 8:30 or so we decided to go to Joni's to watch the movies and just hang out Twas a good night

Yesterday I went to the pool with my brother AJ and my sister Natalie,It was a great time we like swam for a while but that water was COLD although it was like a hot tub conpaired to the water I had to get thrown into at Bretts Cabin,So AJ and I pretty much sat and talked to some people like Joni and stuff.But there were these little 10 year old girls(SATANS)that would not leave me alone I almost yelled SHUT UP AND GO AWAY!!and then I would have picked them up thrown them in the water and drown there little SATANIC heads...but otherwise the pool was great

Today I went to church the usual but heres something not so usual I woke up 15 minutes before we had to leave for church so I was like oh well I better find my church pants..then church got over and it went to the pot trust(FREE FOOD)so We ate and I came bolting up the church stairs like a Dog like monster man and AJ completely clipped my knee with his shoe THAT WAS SOOOOOO PAINFUL HE IS GONNA PAY FOR THAT.After church we came home watched some Invader Zim with Brett then Me and my family went to see Shrek II it was a pretty good movie I really liked it.So we came home Josh came over and we demolished a bike then just cruised for a while so over all I had a good day

Today I wokre up and did the last day of the garage sale Oh How much fun it WAS!riiiight well the cool thing is I added something into my template Don't ask me how I just sorta know it because I am computer smart My template isn't supposed to have the link ability but I now have links to sites on the right sidebar of my blog just scroll on down and click one of um

I went to Hot Topic With AJ today and I'll tell you what most the time I go in there the music is kinda like Rob Zombie and stuff but no this time it's like all of that crappy rock and stuff but hey I got a Bad Mood,Mood Ring so I am happy and am Trying to get the darkest color with it,I also walked home from the pool due to a certian fight I had with a certain friend

Well last nights movie thing didn't turn out the way we would of liked it too out of 30 scenes we taped..I think 7 scenes THAT SUCKS!especially since we were out there all night and we only got that much done plus I thought I lost my new Zippo lighter but it turns out that Fisher found it and has it.SO I BETTER GET IT BACK OR HE DIES.Oh well we are taping more tonight I hope we get alot more done
We are going to tape the movie tonight!the Spoof Movie that has taken us much time to set up,We are gonna tape ALL NIGHT LONG which is gonna be soooo awsome plus I am like one of the hero's so GO ME!

I am back from my 2 week vacation I got back at 12:45 last night and came down threw my shirt off and slept.We did lots of stuff on our trip first of all we left last sunday for New England by car at like 3 o'clock in the afternoon but you know what Screw that because I'm laxy and don't want to type about my trip.

Yeah thats right as the title says ONE ROCKIN TIME First of all My 2 friends slash brothers which are Seth and Matt Seth who came On Friday like 30 minutes after I got back from a 12 hour shift at work like surprised me which was sooooooo frikin awsome because I hadn't seen him for like 3-4 months so we rented some movies as my last post said I believe...Watched um slept,Next morning I went to the bank when they were sleepin to get my 80 doller check that I got for working cashed,got back home then Seth,AJ,Ethan,Natalie and I went to Best Buy and like spent money and all came back home and I wanted my other friend/Bro and his Cousin/my friend Nikol to come over..so they came thus creating the 2 friends/brothers and a cousin part.So we all just chilled as usual and watched AJ play the new game we bought..and at that time was when I picked up a stretchy thing and asked Seth to tell me if it hurt more than my keys....Yeah it definantly hurt him more than my keys it was sooooo awsome but I know it had to hurt him..well tiem went on to 5 and he had to go so he left..I wish he didn't have to because He is so cool.yeah that was just my Saturday,Sunday we went to church and after was a pot trust(Pot Luck) yeah thats right FREE FOOD ok so as usual we went into one of the rooms because we are to loud anywhere else and ate,Had a silverware fight and stuck pieces of corn in Nikol's Shoe thingies..After my family came home and Matt and Nikol went to Matt's Girlfriend's house..We lit off fireworks at my house and someguy from the Gretna Guide or something came over with his Freshman daughter which was cool because we messed around and lit lots of fireworks off although later her and I were on my porch looking for big fireworks and she was flirting with me which I didn't know because I'm stupid when it comes to that but my dad heard so he told me and I'm like GO ME!..Monday I we went to the Weather Underground Concert and met Matt,Nikol,his girlfriend Megan and her sis Kim and we watched the concert and messed around there because there were other bands playing and stuff..we went our seperate ways to go to our houses ..Tuesday Nikol,Matts mom and I did the paper route which was fun..and that night Matt and Nikol came over,Her and I sat on the swing for a bit because AJ and Matt were sewing AJ's jeans,Nikol and I came in I had to pop popcorn and then we went down and watched the Jackass movie yeah it was great because my favorite part is the papercut part and everyone else hated it so they would like look away and stuff,after that Nikol and I sat and watched AJ play the video game again while Matt sewed AJ's jeans..it hit 12 o clock am so they left..next day Wednesday my friend Hugh came over and Nikol called before he came over and wanted to be saved from Matt's house because only his parents were home so I told her AJ's cell he went to pick her up just as Matt came home so he picked them both up and brpught them over which was awsome we chilled they left at five,Hugh and I played some video games then ate Taco's went to Wednesday Night Church and I hung out with my friends like Jenna,Matt,Hugh,Chelsea,and Nikol church got over I came home slept and now it's today.. thus concluding my post for now and filling out the title:A concert 2 friends/brothers a cousin and ONE ROCKIN TIME!

Hi I am the little guy from over there that has infiltrated Levi's bloooooooooog. Now he will write. Here. Now. Ravenous is a very random Movie...People eat people MUNCHIES!Although it's kinda corny it was awsome watching it with my BROTHER SETH AMEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ...HOOTERS

Have you ever gotten angry when someone makes fun of a person with a problem or some new kid?I sure have but I have forgotten what it's like to stand up for them,So when I was watching Hellboy last night and Meyers said what his uncle use to say,it made me realize sometimes the weirdest people are the coolest and that not only should I stand up for them but that I should stand up for myself also.

Last Thursday night I went to my like best friend/Brothers house and we just like partied the whole night,we went and got Chinese food and sat down and watched Texas Chainsaw Massacre II,and we like also went to wal-mart then we got some sleep,Got up Friday morning and played some video games for a bit,then we went out to eat for lunch and I finially met his g/f Rachel,we got home and Him,Shane,Justin and I went on a road trip to Minersville and found out it didn't exist anymore...But on our way home we found a minimum access road and it was like super muddy and super bumby so we switched his blazer to 4 wheel drive and we drove all the way through that thing,got back and we finially left for the village which wasn't the greatest movie but it was ok.plus I got to hang out with the whole group..Saturday morning Seth and I got up and went to his office because we had to take pics for his newspaper job so we started at 11 and went to lik 1:45 we came home.We got in our swim suits and swam for a bit then I had to come home because it was my birthday.so he drove me home and I went out to eat with my family.so my family and I came home we had some cake I opened my presents and then we all went to our seperate rooms ans slept.I love weekends
